com.snakybo.torch.graphics.color

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snakybo.torch.graphics.color.Color
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Color
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    An RGBA color in the range [0-1]

    The color is immutable, meaning usage of the various setters, or mathematical operations in this class will instead create a new Color object with the applied changes. This instance of the color will not be changed.

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
